explains: n. （用蒸汽加压煮出的）浓咖啡
wordGroup: espresso coffee 意大利浓缩咖啡
espresso machine 咖啡机；浓缩咖啡机

sentences.en: I just come back with my black coffee and my double espresso mocha latte skinny frothed, except it isn't espresso.
sentences.cn: 我回到桌位上，双手拿着我的黑咖啡，和一杯双倍浓度无咖啡因少泡沫的穆哈咖啡，其实它不是浓咖啡。

sentences.en: Customers go for a café cortado or an espresso in Continental bars.
sentences.cn: 顾客喜爱 Continental 咖啡厅的意大利浓咖啡和告尔多咖啡。
